p: The results of the virtual screening of the compound library revealed the best score for the naphthalen-1-yl bearing hits (R 1 = H, CH 3). The top 15-scoring-hits also included the naphthalen-1-yl-thioureido, two 4-methoxyphenyl-ureido and two fluorophenyl-ureido hits with the same RMSD, Table 1.
